housing.newHousingDesc: Apartments in newly built residential complexes
housing.landPlotsDesc: Land for construction and agricultural land
housing.domesticProjectsDesc: Residential complexes built with state support

overview.title: NAK - "Nur Astana Kurylys"
overview.subtitle: a dynamically developing construction company that has established itself as a solid and reliable builder in the Kazakhstan market.

about.title: About Us
about.description: "Nur Astana Kurylys" is a multi-profile holding whose scope of activity includes not only housing construction, but also management of its own production base, construction of facilities in HoReCa sector, tender projects, building business centers, as well as rental of commercial and office premises

features.title: Our Advantages

experience.title: Experience and reliability
experience.description: More than 15 years of successful work in the construction market of Kazakhstan with an impeccable reputation and hundreds of implemented projects.

technology.title: Modern technologies
technology.description: Application of innovative construction technologies and materials that meet world quality standards and environmental safety.

approach.title: Comprehensive approach
approach.description: From design to commissioning — a full cycle of work performed by qualified specialists of our company.

features.buildingAlt: Modern building constructed by our company

housing.title: Housing construction
housing.description: Construction of modern residential complexes with comfortable infrastructure that meet all safety and quality requirements.

commercial.title: Commercial real estate
commercial.description: Development and implementation of business centers, shopping complexes and other commercial facilities taking into account the needs of businesses.

social.title: Social facilities
social.description: Construction of schools, hospitals, kindergartens and other socially significant facilities contributing to urban infrastructure development.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure projects
infrastructure.description: Implementation of large-scale infrastructure projects, including roads, bridges and engineering communications to create a comfortable urban environment.

footer.companyDesc: NAK "Nur Astana Kurylys" — a leading construction company in Kazakhstan specializing in the construction of residential complexes and commercial properties with innovative architectural solutions.
